seo.title: Services | SustainSage
seo.description: Explore coaching formats designed for real-life transitions. SustainSage offers bilingual, ICF-aligned coaching for individuals, organisations, and schools across cultures.

hero.title: Coaching formats that fit real life
hero.subtitle: Simple structures, clear boundaries, and bilingual support. We begin by understanding your needs, then choose a rhythm together.
hero.primaryCtaAria: Book an intro session with SustainSage

individual.title: Individual coaching packages
individual.intro: Choose a format based on the depth of support you need. Every package includes check-ins to review pace and fit.

packages.title: Reset – 3 sessions
packages.description: A short, steady container when you want clarity without a long contract.
packages.details: Suited to relocation pivots, returning to work or sense-checking a new direction.

packages.title: Transition – 6 sessions
packages.description: A medium-term partnership to stay grounded across several months of change.
packages.details: Useful when you are redesigning work, identity or boundaries while real life keeps moving.

packages.title: Sustain – Ongoing partnership
packages.description: A longer rhythm for leaders or professionals who value reflective space over time.
packages.details: Designed for monthly or bespoke cadences with regular re-contracting to ensure usefulness.

packages.title: Single focus session
packages.description: A one-off 75–90 minute deep dive around a specific decision or event.
packages.details: Comes with a concise written summary you can revisit after the conversation.

reset3.name: Reset – 3 sessions
for: You are at an early stage of a change — relocation, returning to work, or rethinking your role — and want clarity without a long commitment.
includes: 1 x clarity session to understand your context, values and immediate priorities.
2 x focused coaching sessions on themes you choose (for example: confidence, UK job search approach, rewriting your story, boundaries).
Simple reflection prompts you can use between sessions, only if they serve you.
outcomes: A kinder, clearer picture of what 'good enough for now' looks like.
2–3 self-defined next steps that feel realistic in your current life.
A sense of whether further coaching would be useful — with no pressure.
not: Not a guaranteed job, visa or promotion package.
Not an assessment, diagnosis or therapy process.

transition6.name: Transition – 6 sessions
for: You are in the middle of a significant transition (career change, relocation, parental leave, identity shift) and want a thinking partner over several months.
includes: 1 x contracting session to shape focus, measures of 'useful', and boundaries.
4 x working sessions to explore patterns, test options and respond to real-life events.
1 x review session to integrate learning and design what comes next.
Light, agreed check-ins between sessions for accountability or reflection prompts (not 24/7 messaging).
outcomes: A story about your transition that feels honest and grounded.
Experiments and decisions that fit your energy, finances and responsibilities.
Tools to keep adjusting after the package ends.
not: Not done 'to' you — you lead; we partner.
No outcome guarantees; we focus on awareness, alignment and doable action.

sustain10.name: Sustain – Ongoing partnership
for: Leaders, founders or professionals who value a longer-term reflective space.
includes: A agreed rhythm of sessions (for example monthly) with regular re-contracting.
Space to work on leadership, impact, wellbeing and complexity in a culturally aware way.
notes: We review every few months to ensure coaching remains ethical, useful and not a dependency.

single.name: Single focus session
for: You have one specific decision or event (for example a UK interview or review) and want a single deep dive.
includes: A short written summary of key insights and options that you choose from.

organisation.title: Support for organisations & schools
organisation.intro: We design bilingual coaching and reflective workshops that protect psychological safety and align with your policies.
points: Co-create group coaching series or workshops that balance cultural nuance with clear ground rules.
Partner on ethical frameworks, referral pathways, and consent processes for your teams or students.
Provide bilingual summaries so stakeholders can continue the work between sessions without losing context.

practical.title: Practical information
practical.intro: Transparency helps you plan. We confirm all details in writing before work begins.
items: Sessions can take place online or in-person within the UK when schedules allow.
Languages available: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, or a blend.
We operate primarily in UK time (GMT/BST) and can discuss alternatives for international clients.
Fees are shared after the intro call with clear scopes; sliding scales are available for community-led work.

faqSnippet.title: Good to know
faqSnippet.intro: A few common questions before we meet.

items.question: How soon can we start?
items.answer: Intro calls are usually available within two UK working weeks. Coaching begins once agreements are signed.

items.question: Do you coach in mixed languages?
items.answer: Yes. Many clients switch languages mid-session; we will check what feels most comfortable for you.

items.question: Will we receive documentation?
items.answer: You will receive summaries of agreements, safeguarding boundaries, and optional reflection notes after sessions.

cta.title: Start with a conversation
cta.body: Share what you are navigating and we will outline formats—or signpost other support—so you can choose confidently.
cta.primaryAria: Book an intro session with SustainSage
